-- | A parser for CSV files that uses Attoparsec
--   
--   An APLv2-licensed Attoparsec-based parser library for comma-separated
--   values (CSV) files. (http:<i></i>www.ietf.org<i>rfc</i>rfc4180.txt)
@package attoparsec-csv
@version 0.1.0.1

module Text.ParseCSV
type CSV = [[Text]]
parseCSV :: Text -> Either String CSV
